content: tunisian crochet shaker dishcloths a tunisian crochet pattern by staci perry www verypink com ​​ getting started size finished dishcloth is about 7 25 19cm in diameter ​ hook/needles size us k 6 5mm two knitting needles size 10 or 10 5 6 or 6 5mm ​ yarn knit picks comfy worsted or any worsted also called 10 ply weight yarn in cotton or a cotton blend in two ​ colors 20 grams of yarn for each dishcloth 10 grams each color additional materials tapestry needle ​ gauge 4 stitches per inch ​ note about crochet hooks you can use a tunisian crochet hook or a straight regular crochet hook without a thick ​ grip on it there are few enough stitches on the hook in these dishcloths that a long tunisian hook isn t really necessary detail on the yarn i used i used knit picks comfy worsted my favorite dishcloth yarn in the following colors ​ white honey dew sea foam marlin creme brulee and fizz working tunisian crochet right-to-left row pick up stitches across as many as indicated from the vertical loops in the row below left-to-right row yarn over and pull through one loop *yarn over and pull through two loops* repeat between the *s until one loop remains video links part 1 intro https //youtu be/z0qat8bhtrk ​ part 2 working the segments https //youtu be/z0qat8bhtrk t=4m6s ​ part 3 kitchener stitch and finishing https //youtu be/z0qat8bhtrk t=15m10s ​ directions provisional cast-on using either color of yarn crochet chain 20 break yarn and pull end through last loop to fasten using other color of yarn and starting at the slip knot end of the crochet chain pick up 15 stitches from the spine of the crochet chain work a left-to-right row completing a row of stitches by yarning-over and pulling through one loop then yarning-over and pulling through two loops across the rest of the stitches until one loop remains in the instructions below each row means working right-to-left and left-to-right to complete one tunisian crochet row segments 1-11 row 1 pick up 2 3 loops on hook work back row 2 pick up 4 5 loops on hook work back row 3 pick up 6 7 loops on hook work back row 4 pick up 8 9 loops on hook work back row 5 pick up 10 11 loops on hook work back row 6 pick up 12 13 loops on hook work back until 2 loops remain on hook break color a and start using color b pull new color through last two loops on hook row 7 pick up 14 15 loops on hook work back work row 1-7 11 times 12th segment row 1 pick up 2 3 loops on hook work back row 2 pick up 4 5 loops on hook work back row 3 pick up 6 7 loops on hook work back row 4 pick up 8 9 loops on hook work back row 5 pick up 10 11
